Hi all,

I'm running Heritrix 3.1.0 source from eclipse. My requirement is =
to make the heritrix crawling a job daily by modifying the source code. 

I=
 was able to do this with heririx 1.14.4 by modifying crawlEnding() method =
in CrawlJobHandler.java. Here I changed the code to create a new job and st=
art it again.

Can you please tell me how to do this with Heritrix 3.1.0?

=
Regards
